mapper.insert: insert into Item(Type, mbti, userName, price, itemName, location, tel, contents, ratingAvg, updateDate, uprating, imgUrl) value(#{Type},#{mbti}, #{userName}, #{price}, #{itemName},#{location}, #{tel}, #{contents}, #{ratingAvg}, #{updateDate}, #{uprating}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.select: select * from Item where location like #{location}%
selct * from Item where mbti =#{mbti} and location Like #{location}%
